Text.Page:
, the runekeepers have bottled us up in camp for days now.

I need to send vital intelligence on the mekonaris to others in the Mysterium. If you can occupy the runekeepers even briefly, I can get a messenger through.
Fantastic, <PCNAME>. At least if we're overrun, my notes and data are with our colleagues where they'll be of some use. We learned a lot about the mekonaris, trapped here among them.
